content: check the video-tutorial for the tricky rounds 7 and 8 dutch version is for 20 cm hoop and huisje van katoen barbante m yarn and 25 cm hoop minimop lankava the star dreamcatcher in dutch with 10 points an english version with 12 points this is a **quick and easy** project that makes a great gift crochet the small mandala of 8 rounds with a little bit double-sided texture that means that we work in this mandala on the right side as ususal and we work one round on the wrong side this is a way to get a texture on both sides of the mandala check the **video-tutorial** for the tricky rounds 7 and 8 https //youtu be/8lnv1wy4ft0 decorate the dreamcatcher with whatever you like such as wooden or gemstones beads shells coloured ribbon or self-made tassels the project contains * graph / chart * written instructions * very detailed step-by-step pictures * written instructions in english language american terminology * graph symbols using us crochet terminology skill level **upper beginner till intermediate** upper beginner should know some special stitches special stitches **3dc cluster fptr fphdc**
